ListItem.Paragraph: Your soul needs a KEEPER to be healthy.
Your soul needs a CENTER to be healthy.
ListItem.Quote: If any of you lacks widsom, you should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to you. But when you ask, you must believe and not doubt, because the one who doubts is like a wave of the sea, blown and tossed by the wind. That person should not expect to receive anything from the Lord. Such a person is double-minded and unstable in all they do.

ListItem.Paragraph: A soul without a center has difficulty MAKING DECISIONS.
A soul without a center finds its identity in EXTERNALS.
A soul without a center lacks PATIENCE.
Your soul needs REST to be healthy.
Your soul needs BALANCE to be healthy.
